item.title: Introducing: Straight Shot, No Chaser with Tezlyn Figaro
item.itunes:title: Introducing: Straight Shot, No Chaser with Tezlyn Figaro
item.description:
Straight Shot, No Chaser with Tezlyn Figaro (@tezlynfigaro) examines controversial and thought-provoking topics with diverse guests to discuss politics, social consciousness, and culture. Through weekly conversations, Tezlyn invites guests to share their views and experiences, raw and unfiltered, to educate, uplift, and provide honest insight into the issues facing the Black community in America. A mix of hip-hop and political expertise, Tezlyn keeps her ears to the street and brings her knowledge and savvy to every discussion with power and purpose.

¬†

Listen¬†here and subscribe to Straight Shot, No Chaser with Tezlyn Figaro on the iHeartRadio app or wherever you get your podcasts!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Ep 291: I've Never Swallowed (Ft. Flame Monroe)
item.itunes:title: Ep 291: I've Never Swallowed (Ft. Flame Monroe)
item.description:
This week the ladies are joined by Comedian Flame Monroe for the laughs and all things inappropriate. They dive into trans matters and the political realm of sexuality. The Ice Breaker round leads to a dissection of celebrity sex tapes before Flame shares her do's and don'ts, turn ons and turn offs in the bedroom. We wrap with a discussion on the importance of voting and political nature we currently face with gender identity and sexuality and where she stands on the fence.¬†

Follow Flame Monroe on Instagram @monroeflame

Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii B @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages
Instagram @whoreible_decisions
Twitter @whoreiblepod

Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!

item.itunes:title: Ep 290: Not Brain Damage From A Cheater
item.description:
On this week‚Äôs episode, your favorite podcast duo is in the studio solo dolo and they start off SPICY! They discuss a recent guest who attempted to charge for their appearance and podcast etiquette. This week‚Äôs Vanilla Sh-t gets into how cheating does actually have an effect on the brain after Khloe Kardashian shares her PTSD from Tristian‚Äôs cheating ways. Story Time: Weezy shares her most recent date where an unexpected guest showed up!

¬†

item.title: Ep 286: Dating is a Dud
item.itunes:title: Ep 286: Dating is a Dud
item.description:
This week on Whoreible Decisions, Mandii & Weezy get back into their woes of dating and they both currently stand in the realm of love. While both navigate being single and dating again, they both find their standards to have changed in what they want after both ending strong relationships. This week‚Äôs Vanilla Sh-t touches on Frank Ocean releasing his $250k cockring while the Heaux Fact about working more = sexing LESS!! Find out how overworking can actually lead to a lower sex drive. Mandii shares a sex tip on Wax Play before the duo gets into a study about how raised dating standards by women is actually causing dating to be tougher for men.

Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii B @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

item.title: Ep 277: Accepting Change in Your Partner (Ft. Amir & Basirah )
item.itunes:title: Ep 277: Accepting Change in Your Partner (Ft. Amir & Basirah )
item.description:
This week the ladies are joined by a couple and podcast duo, Amir and Basirah of the ‚ÄúBoth Sides of the Bed‚Äù Podcast. They begin by asking relationship questions to the couple and how they maintain their non-traditional monogam-ish relationship with one another. This week‚Äôs Vanilla we bring up a topic from Shan Boody‚Äôs podcast ‚ÄúLovers & Friends‚Äù where a guest mentioned doing a sex act that she didn‚Äôt quite like to do. Is there anything you do for the pleasure of your partner even though you don‚Äôt enjoy it? We deep dive into that before discussing changes in your partner and how to navigate a relationship with the growth that comes with being human. From physical appearance to relationship dynamics, what happens when your partner changes?

Follow this week‚Äôs guests and subscribe to hear more from them on their podcast, ‚ÄúBoth Sides of the Bed‚Äù wherever you listen to your favorite podcasts
Instagram Podcast: @bothsidesofthebed
Amir Instagram: @amir_rashad
Basirah Instagram: @basirah__

item.itunes:title: Ep 276: Unicorning on Vacay
item.description:
The ladies are back in the studio after a much needed break from the pod world! The duo starts with an update on their personal love lives and where they currently stand in the dating world. This week‚Äôs Vanilla Sh-t we discuss the Brazillian influencer that ended up in a wheelchair for holding in her farts around her boyfriend. With dating new partners, the ladies talk about what things they just aren‚Äôt comfortable doing. Encore! Mandii shares her story about meeting a couple during her break in Mexico and becoming a unicorn. Have you ever met a couple on vacation? Well listen to how she was able to bag them!

item.title: Ep 274: A Romp Through the Ages
item.itunes:title: Ep 274: A Romp Through the Ages
item.description:
On this week's episode of Whoreible Decisions, the ladies are in the studio solo dolo discussing more heaux things. They start with a quick catch-up before diving into this week's Vanilla Sh-t where a woman who once sold her farts in a jar is now making $5k a day selling her boob sweat. The ladies then romp through the ages from a sex historian perspective as they dig into the oldest sex toys, birth control methods and BDSM from the stone ages.

item.itunes:title: Ep 270: Chaos Theory (Ft. Leah McSweeney)
item.description:
We have a returning guest on the pod this week! Mandii and Weezy are joined by Leah McSweeney, cast member of RHONY, owner of Married to the Mob and author ‚ÄúChaos Theory‚Äù. Leah explains her Leah Bitchisms before diving into Chaos Theory- literally. We discuss drug usage and rehab amongst her journey to finding herself and becoming the unapologetic bad ass that many have grown to love. From those who slut shame to how you can move on from your soul mate, let‚Äôs GET INTO IT!!

item.title: Ep 269: Titties & Tassles (Ft. The Sweet Spot)
item.itunes:title: Ep 269: Titties & Tassles (Ft. The Sweet Spot)
item.description:
On this week‚Äôs episode, your favorite duo is joined by the owners of The Sweet Spot, an all black traveling Burlesque company. The group discusses the history of burlesque and how it has transformed over the years. Is Burlesque similar, if not the exact same, as stripping? From tips to titties with tassels, the discussion introduces seduction in a space without sex. From discussing how to use all senses to arouse your partner along (https://expmag.com/2019/06/the-science-of-attraction/ ) to a man who married three identical triplets (https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/man-marrying-identical-triplets-says-26781655), enjoy the educational and funny adventure of diving into all things burlesque.

Want to experience a play party hosted by Mandii B? Join us Sunday, May 29th in New York City!! Submit your vetting form here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScM9byQH9HiQUwvvKcifAaNGulbgH7_aJDpD5J76c7epFfsCA/viewform and purchase your tickets once approved. item.title: Ep 265: Single Again, Back on the Prowl
item.itunes:title: Ep 265: Single Again, Back on the Prowl
item.description:
On this week’s episode of Whoreible Decisions, Weezy and Mandii are in separate spaces due to work and have a helluva Kiki remotely to let the world know they are both SINGLE AGAIN…but only one is back on the prowl. With a brief relationship status update, the ladies discuss where they are in their dating lives. The discussion of sex in prisons is deeply discussed before switching to the Whore’derve of the week about masturbating and being sexual while grieving. This leads Weezy down a rabbit hole of possibly the STRANGEST sex toy to date discussed on the pod. We end with a hoeConfession that leads to a common question that many people may face in the bedroom.

 

Want to experience a Formal Erotic Dining experience hosted by Mandii B? Join us Saturday, May 28th in New York City!! item.title: Ep 261: Cheating, Narcissism & Affair Recovery (Ft. Mac Stanley Cazeau)
item.itunes:title: Ep 261: Cheating, Narcissism & Affair Recovery (Ft. Mac Stanley Cazeau)
item.description:
On this week's episode the duo are joined by a Mac Stanley Cazeau, a couples therapist and dating coach. We start the pod with why some couples may find themselves in therapy before debunking some therapy myths. What is couples therapy like? Mac shares one of the reasons he told someone to breakup after a session. Both Mandii and Weezy end the episode by sharing relationship mishaps. Weezy shares a trait she would like to change about herself and behavior with her partners while Mandii shares why she finally put an end to her relationship and what matters to her most.¬†


If you want to share a heaux mail or heaux tale, email us at whoreibledecisions@gmail.com

This week‚Äôs Vanilla Sh-t touches on education of masturbation and if it should be the parent‚Äôs or teachers‚Äô responsibility to guide a child through puberty milestones. Ryan shares a sex tip for the fellas before they trio dive into the conversation on enjoying sex, time and company with multiple people while not wanting to ‚Äúsettle down‚Äù. How do you not lead the person on that you‚Äôve been spending time with and being intimate? What boundaries should be set to protect everyone‚Äôs feelings‚Ä¶..if you even care to begin with. Let‚Äôs get into it

item.itunes:title: Ep 224: Score Keeping, Ear Lobes & the Toxicity
item.description:
This week the duo are solo in the studio! Jokes ensue and laughs are exchanged. This week‚Äôs Vanilla Sh-t is about keeping score in a relationship & how it‚Äôs standard human practices to want to feel as though you are receiving what you are putting out in a relationship. Mandii shares a Whore‚Äôderve about ears [again] and this time we are talking about lobe licking! Weezy calls Old Bae to ask his obsession with her lobes. Then we are revisiting toxic relationships where we question how and why we chose to put up with certain things from our partners. Ending off with a game of toxic Would you rather‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.

item.description:
This week the duo are joined in the studio with Mr Slithers & Mistress D, a couple who met engaging in Cuck. We talk sex club etiquette, swinger terminology and they share how they actually met in a cucking relationship with a previous partner. Our couple this week is also interracial and we speak to any societal views on Black men with Asian women and how they address it in their relationship. For this week‚Äôs Vanilla Sh-t, we dive into sex part advice and tips for beginners (https://www.vice.com/en/article/9393ee/sex-party-advice-tips-for-beginners) & for the Whore‚Äôderve our guests share some amazing sex tips regarding couples interested in cuckholding. item.description:
This week the duo is in the studio joined by the ladies of the Black Girls Texting Podcast, Chels & Sade. The ladies start with an Ice breaker before diving into the real tea. Vanilla Sh-t this week brings up the horror of a Spring Breaker who lost her life and the ladies attempt to give advice for safety while traveling. This simply lead to stories of how UNSAFE we are as women and we do put ourselves in harms way without knowing it. We share how we are blessed to be able to recant these stories today because many women cannot. Chels shares a sex tip during the Whore‚Äôderv before we dive into the WD which includes all the women discussing the 5 things that get in the way of Black women‚Äôs sex lives. item.title: Period Sis: POF (Ft. Melissa Felix)
item.itunes:title: Period Sis: POF (Ft. Melissa Felix)
item.description:
At the age of 37, the doctor told me, ‚ÄúYou have the body of a 51-year-old post-menopausal women‚Äù - Melissa Felix


If that sentence shocked you as much as it shocked me, you‚Äôll be even more surprised to hear that it‚Äôs more common than you think. A missed period here and there, and hot flashes that we dismiss as "dehydration‚Äù can be our body's way of signaling a larger problem for us to address.¬†


In this episode, we will unpack what premature ovarian failure (POF) is with our special guest Melissa Felix. Melissa bravely shares her journey about undergoing menopause earlier than she anticipated and her ‚Äútrial & error‚Äù fiasco with the doctors that she saw.


The vulnerability and misfortune with seeking proper diagnosis brought both the guest and myself to tears!¬†


Please make it a priority to get a reoccurring check-up and seek preventative care. Please share this episode with a friend so they can prioritize their health also.¬†

‚Ä®In an effort to support our guest throughout her journey please donate to the Go fund me and contribute what you can (even if that‚Äôs $1).¬†


Go Fund Me:¬†

gf.me/u/y55sud


Connect with me:¬†

‚Ä®@Officialboxowner

@Fullcourtpumps


Get your Mandii B merch now at¬†Mandiib.com¬†Don't miss out on your chance to wear your favorite coined phrases on merch that will last forever!¬†

item.title: Ep 198: Steve Harvey Really Ruined Dating
item.itunes:title: Ep 198: Steve Harvey Really Ruined Dating
item.description:
In one of the last episodes of the year, the duo talk about how 2020 has changed their lives for the better and things they have learned about themselves. item.itunes:title: Ep170: A Fight Worth Fighting
item.description:
*Trigger Warning: This episode brings up conversations that could be triggering for some. Please proceed with caution. On this week's episode we revisit previous conversation involving race, police brutality and the use of the N-word amongst other POC. Mandii relives her traumatic experience in London where she realizes the PTSD from police brutality in America (Ep109), Weezy goes off on a white listener who wrote in regarding feeling "socioeconomically" effected by a previous black sex worker and her experience with white supremacy (Ep41) and for many, a large portion of a bonus episode featuring Brianda from the Super Trip Talk Podcast discusses colorism in the latinX community, the use of the N word along with inclusivity as it pertains to the WD audience. Continue in the conversation by following us on social media @Whoreiblepod on Twitter & @whoreible_decisions on Twitter. Be sure to use the hashtag #Whoreibledecisions and subscribe and rate. item.description:
Looking for something to binge during quarantine? Well we have something for you! You can now binge watch The Sopranos and then tune in to Made Women: A Sopranos Re-Watch Podcast. It's like recapping episodes and discussing your favorite characters with one of the actual characters. Made Women. Summary: Actor and Sopranos star, Drea De Matteo and her best friend, entrepreneur & New Jersey native Chris Kushner, invite listeners into the ultimate inner circle with Made Women, a Sopranos re-watch podcast exploring one of the most essential crime-dramas of all time. Fans of the iconic mob series will head back to the New Jersey Turnpike, diving into the notorious mafioso world with De Matteo and Kushner as they break down the series episode-by-episode, offering exclusive insight, never-before-heard stories from behind-the-scenes, and so much more. While Mandii was in LA, she got into the studio to record with a dating expert and relationship coach to discuss how to successfully date online and why so many people are not using the online dating sites effectively. Is your profile keeping you from finding the love of your life? Find out the 3 C's of dating online. item.itunes:title: Sibling Revelry Podcast with Kate Hudson and Oliver Hudson
item.description:
Looking for a new podcast? We're excited to tell you about Sibling Revelry podcast with Kate and Oliver Hudson, which explores the sibling bond, family dynamics, the human mind, body, and so much more. On the show, Kate and Oliver dive deep into the things that interest them and talk to other siblings in a free-formed, wide open, relaxed conversation to not only have some laughs, but to maybe inspire some people along the way with universal tales of what it‚Äôs like to grow up with brothers and sisters. If you like what you hear at the end of our show, head over to the Sibling Revelry with Kate Hudson & Oliver Hudson Podcast and subscribe for free! item.itunes:title: Ep136: Am I Transphobic? Feat Hope Giselle & Tahoe
item.description:
With Mandii away on a vacation, Weezy gets in the studio for a conversation inspired by a heated IG live between Tahoe and Hope. Hope is a black trans woman activist who confronted Tahoe about his claims on being possibly transphobic. Tune in for a deep conversation, a chance to learn, and a the breakdown of stigmas facing black trans women everyday. Enjoyed this week's guest? Tahoe - @Tahoe_TV or his podcast So Shameless. Hope - @hopedisguised on all platforms Buy her book Becoming Hope:Removing the disguise This week's episode is brought to you by BLUECHEW! Visit bluechew.com and get your first shipment FREE when you use promocode WHOREIBLE. Just pay $5 shipping. Try it free today! item.title: The Mother Load w/ Missi Pyle & Constance Zimmer
item.itunes:title: The Mother Load w/ Missi Pyle & Constance Zimmer
item.description:
Excited to tell you about The Mother Load podcast, an alternative parenting show from actresses and friends Constance Zimmer and Missi Pyle, which rips the bandaid off of the reality of what it takes to be a parent. Together, with a variety of celebrity friends and experts, Constance and Missi build an unfiltered parenting community filled with authentic conversations and experiences. From an anonymous confessions line, to listener questions and advice, this podcast is a reminder to everyone that they are not alone in this crazy journey called parenthood. If you like what you hear, head over to wherever you listen to your favorite podcast and check out the Mother Load Podcast. Don't forget to hit subscribe! You can find the podcast here: https://link.chtbl.com/themotherload_FD_001

item.title: Ep131: Defining Dating Terms Feat Dustin Ross
item.itunes:title: Ep131: Defining Dating Terms Feat Dustin Ross
item.description:
On this week's episode, the duo is joined by none other than Dustin Ross, 1/3 of the Friend Zone Podcast and co-host of Keepin it Bute with Star Brim. The three of them catch up with one another before digging into the issue in the community we have with the respect of trans women and the men who love them. The three amigos then dig into a somewhat odd kink of the week and boy do the jokes fly!! (We apologize if anyone felt offended during this segment this week) For this week's Whoreible Decision, the ladies use assistance from Dustin with trying to break down dating terms and their actual meanings. Could it be possible that we just all don't know what the hell we are doing with dating? Why can't we have universal meanings for these terms? Follow this week's guest on Instagram/Twitter @LookatDustin and be sure to check out The Friend Zone podcast and Keepin' It Bute Follow the hosts on Twitter and IG! Mandii @fullcourtpumps Weezy @weezywtf Follow @whoreiblepod on Twitter and use the hashtag #whoreibleDecisions when tweeting about this week's episode! item.itunes:title: Ep118: My Body, My Choice
item.description:
On this week's episode, the duo are joined by two professionals, Lacey and Danielle to speak on abortions, contraception options and what the hell is going on in government concerning women's rights to their bodies. They group dive into myths surrounding abortions and clear some things up regarding common misconceptions regarding the procedure and aftermath. Mandii digs deeper into her abortion story and relates psychological reasons to her "fear" of having to go through another one. Weezy also shares her abortion story in further detail. Please visit the organization Danielle is apart of at https://www.nirhealth.org/ https://abortionfunds.org/ - where people can donate, there are many others! https://www.sistersong.net/reproductive-justice - learn about SisterSong and Reproductive Justice! National abortion federation, which has a find a provider feature: https://prochoice.org/ This week's episode is brought to you by Scentbird. During this week's episode the duo add some testosterone to the room and are joined by the hosts of the Dad Hats and Bowties Podcast. The duo were bamboozled by the guys when they realize neither host has been pegged but has an interesting story about him enjoying booty play. item.itunes:title: Ep114: Astrological Heaux feat Mecca Woods
item.description:
On this week's episode the duo are joined by astrologist Mecca Woods to discuss astrology as it pertains to relationships and sex. Find out if your sign is keeping you from happiness or simply if it's all fluff. Which signs are compatible and should you determine your love life based on the stars? We dig deep into the meaning of astrology, what it means, and how you can use it as a guide. item.itunes:title: Ep110: What's a Doula do? Feat Michellee
item.description:
On this week's episode of Whoreible Decisions Mandii and Weezy are joined in the studio by Michelle, a doula. What is a doula? On this episode we get into the doula profession and child birth. Where do babies come from? Are there kinks associated with baby delivery? What is postpartum and how does it effect women? We get into all the good sh-t this week as it pertains to pregnancy and everything associated with such. You can email this week's guest at lovelylivesds@gmail.com or followe her on social media at the below: Instagram: @Michellee_thelovelydoula Business IG: @lovelylivesdoula Doula Recources: Www.doulamatch.net (website to search for doulas around the country) Northern New Jersey Doula Net Http://nnjdoulanet.com/ (doulas for low income families in NJ https://www.doulaproject.net/ (Doulas for low income families in NYC) Free prenatal and breastfeeding classes in NYC https://www.meetup.com/New-York-City-Breastfeeding-Support-Group/messages/boards/thread/50794203/ *For free breastfeeding help* Your local La Leche Legu√© https://www.llli.org/ Want to support Whoreible Decisions? Become a patron and receive 3 bonus episodes per month at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions Tickets are still available for the 2nd LA show and Toronto show of the WD tour! Visit @Whoreible_decisions on IG and click the link in bio to purchase tickets now. Share your thoughts on this week's episode on Twitter and use #whoreibledecisions or tag @whoreiblepod Follow the show on IG @whoreible_decisions and the hosts Mandii @fullcourtpumps & Weezy @Weezywtf

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

item.title: Ep106: When Negative is a Good Thing Feat Janelle & Omo
item.itunes:title: Ep106: When Negative is a Good Thing Feat Janelle & Omo
item.description:
On this week's episode the duo are joined in the studio by Janelle and Omo, two ladies who administer HIV tests in New York City's biggest neighborhoods. The ladies delve into getting tested, how to handle not so great news with results and debunk some of the biggest myths surrounding "the big H". They share stories about having to share positive results and the girls ask everything under the sun about how to be responsible and stay safe in the age of casual dating and one night stands. We don't feel it would be right if we didn't bring these conversations to the platform so we hope you find the comedic relief and education in this week's episode. item.title: Bonus: #SurvivingSociety feat Jade, Michelle Hope, Jamilah Lemieux
item.itunes:title: Bonus: #SurvivingSociety feat Jade, Michelle Hope, Jamilah Lemieux
item.description:
On this bonus episode Mandii is joined at the round table with other strong, black and opinionated women to discuss the Lifetime docu-series Surviving Rkelly and the larger scope of the issues that were brought to light. We discuss sexual abuse as it pertains to both girls and boys, the responsibility put on children and teenagers to respond to predators, holding adults accountable, turning a blind eye when things aren't right and more! Michelle Hope is a sexpert that focuses on sex and child development and the importance of sex education starting from an early age and in the household. Jade is the host of podcasts Gettin' Grown and Jade&XD while also a wife and mother. Jamilah Lemieux, while having had appeared on Surviving Rkelly, is a critic, black feminist, and voice for the #MeToo movement. It was important that we brought this dialogue to our platform and started the conversation. Please feel free to discuss this on social media using the hashtag #SurvivingSociety Follow the ladies on this episode on their social media: Jade @jadeofalljades IG/Twitter Michelle Hope @MHsexpert IG/Twitter Jamilah Lemieux @JamilahLemieux IG/Twitter Mandii @Fullcourtpumps IG/Twitter

item.description:
This week the duo are joined by none other than Sarunas Jackson, actor who plays Dro on the hit TV show Insecure. They break the ice with Sarunas by asking questions sent in from the fans and finding out if Sarunas is a fan of booty play or not. In an unfiltered fashion, the ladies ask ALL the questions we all want to know. The conversation continues with role play fantasies and finally gets into dating, and whether having so many preferences can keep you single. How many traits are you willing to pass up on to find your partner? This episode is juicy! item.title: Ep77: Working Out the Kinks Feat a Therapist
item.itunes:title: Ep77: Working Out the Kinks Feat a Therapist
item.description:
The THERAPY EPISODE! We ain't goin nowhere! As many of you know, there has been quite some drama between the duo of Whoreible Decisions. This episode they decide to sit with a certified therapist to work out their issues. Communication is so big and can be the downfall of any relationship and from this session, Weezy and Mandii both face their biggest downfalls when it comes to effectively communicating with each other. Coming from two sides of the same coin, Weezy and Mandii go on an emotional roller coaster to see if Whoreible Decisions can keep going. We want to thank Chris Morrow, A-King, the Loudspeakers Network, and Dr. Maya Pettiford for taking the time to help Weezy and I solve our differences. Again, this episode may be hard to get through, but as many minorities, we don't take our mental health into consideration nor have we considered seeking therapy. This episode could change the way you look at therapy and possibly how you choose to communicate with loved ones. Don't forget to use the hashtag #WhoreibleDecisions or tag @Whoreiblepod @Fullcourtpumps on Twitter so that we can keep up with your responses and follow us on Instagram @Whoreible_Decisions

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Ep40: Living HIV Positive
item.itunes:title: Ep40: Living HIV Positive
item.description:
In this episode the duo are joined in the studio by an African-American, straight male born with the HIV virus. The episode tries to shed light on the virus and debunk myths associated with the disease. We truly hope we did justice to this topic in conversation and helped educate our listeners as we certainly learned things along the way during this recording. If you or a loved on has recently been diagnosed with HIV, we can connect you with Tavares via social media for emotional support. Song: Jessy J- Who you are Want to support us? Become a patron at Patreon.com/WhoreibleDecisions where you can gain access to bonus episodes and footage. Don't forget to follow and interact with us on social media: Mandii B @Fullcourtpumps on IG/TWITTER Weezy @WeezyWTF on IG @whoreible_decisions on IG @WhoreiblePod on Twitter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

item.itunes:title: Ep37: Living as a Trans-Man
item.description:
As requested, the duo are joined in the studio by Rush LDN, a trans-man. This week's episode gets down to the tough questions many of us have about the transgender community and living in today's society. The discussion takes a chronological approach to the changes in a one's life in undergoing transition. In this case, it's a woman who has fully transitioned into a married, straight man.
